Class UnderlinePainter

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Highlighter.HighlightPainter

    public class UnderlinePainter
extends AbstractTokenHighlightPainter
    A token painter that paints a simple underline.

      • strokeBias

        protected int strokeBias
        This is an extra margin added to the bottom of the highlight clipping to account for the thickness of the stroke. You may need to adjust this is the stroke is unusually thick or if it curves.
